short_summary: Maintenance and repairs for overhead doors
description: There is a mandatory site visit on 11 January 2024 at 10:00 EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 23 January 2024 at 14:00 EST.
tags: Building and facility maintenance and repair services
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Overhead Doors at Main Petawawa Garrison
==============================================

**Reference and Solicitation Information**
--------------------------------------

* Reference Number: WS4336620799
* Solicitation Number: WS4336620799
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: December 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 23, 2024 at 14:00 EST

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide overhead door services and repairs at the Main Petawawa Garrison.
* The contract duration is expected to span from February 1, 2024, to November 30, 2026.
* The contractor will be required to supply all labor, materials, tools, and equipment necessary for the service and repairs.

**Eligibility and Opportunities**
------------------------------

* The procurement is open to all eligible bidders.
* The contract will be awarded based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.
* The trade agreements applicable to this procurement include the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and others.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

* A site visit is mandatory on January 11, 2024, at 10:00 EST.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 23, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Contracting Entity and Contact Information**
-----------------------------------------

* The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence (DND).
* Contact information for this opportunity can be found on the CanadaBIC website.

**Notice and Attachment**
----------------------

* A notice has been posted on the Ariba Discovery platform with further details on the procurement.
* No attachments are required for this opportunity.

Tender projects bring fascinating business functionalities to our versatile contracting operations. Register your business to bid on new and upcoming contracts. Upon registration, use the search term `Overhead Doors at Main Petawawa Garrison` to access the Ariba Discovery platform and submit your bid. If you require any further assistance or support, access the links provided in this Tender Briefing Note.
